thread.title: Fire crews called to blaze at Cardiff home
thread.title_full: Fire crews called to blaze at Cardiff home | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Fire crews called to blaze at Cardiff home
text:
The fire service is asking motorists to avoid Ninian Road in Cardiff as they investigate a blaze.
Three fire crews are currently at Ninian Road in Cardiff Credit: Google Street View South Wales Fire and Rescue were called after flames were seen coming from a ground-floor property.
SW Fire & Rescue @SWFireandRescue Follow Crews attending incident on Ninian Road Cardiff. Heavy traffic in area. Seek alternative routes. #SWControl NR
14:15 - 3 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Last updated Thu 3 Sep 2015 Travel Cardiff
